definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: But, what if the bike lanes then become congested?
sentences.chinese: 但是，自行车道要是变得拥挤那怎么办？

sentences.english: It is a barefaced lie to say there are few bike lanes in China.
sentences.chinese: 说在中国很少有自行车道是一个无耻的谎言。

sentences.english: Cycling around the Hualien sea-front bike trail.
sentences.chinese: 悠游于花莲滨海自行车道内。

sentences.english: Inside, the floor will appear in epoxy, the light-blue bicycle path respectively.
sentences.chinese: 内部，地板分别呈现为环氧树脂和淡蓝色自行车道。

sentences.english: The project will also upgrade existing tram lines, bus stops, and bicycle paths.
sentences.chinese: 该项目还将改造现有的电车线和自行车道。

sentences.english: The synthetic light-blue coating used in Denmark for bicycle paths will cover the roof.
sentences.chinese: 在丹麦用于自行车道的合成淡蓝色涂层覆盖屋顶。

sentences.english: The road shoulder was the Changbin bike trail.
Synthetic light-blue coating used in Denmark for bicycle paths will cover the roof.
sentences.chinese: 合成淡蓝色涂层用丹麦自行车道将覆盖屋顶。

sentences.english: I cycled for over two hours without seeing a car, or even a scooter.
sentences.chinese: 但是自行车道规划得很好，不会跟汽车抢道，很安全。

sentences.english: What do you think about the cycling roads in London?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得伦敦的自行车道怎么样？

sentences.english: but I do bike in the bike lanes on First Avenue.
sentences.chinese: 不过我会在第一大街的自行车道上骑车。

definition: mixed use (e.g. pedestrians and vehicles)/joint operation (e.g. trains and buses)
